channel.title: Cache on Felix B
channel.description: Recent content in Cache on Felix B

item.title: Caches
item.description: We want to maximise cache hit ratio, i.e. amount of accesses where data is present in cache. Cache mapping Direct: Maps each block of main memory to one possible cache line. Means that if two bits of data are mapped to the same cache line, one must be swapped out. Associative: Any memory block can be stored in any cache line, but cache logic must then search through every cache line to check if something is in the cache.
